utilities

Class Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Colors

  • public class Colors
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class which houses the color codes for all colors we are using.
    Author:
    heshamsalman

      • getRandomColorFamily

        public static java.awt.Color[] getRandomColorFamily()

        Returns:

      • redFamily

        private static java.awt.Color[] redFamily()
        Family colors return from lightest to darkest. Middle array value is the "base" color. Color families are derived from Paletton.com To add a new family, please generate it from Paletton.
        Returns:
        color family
